N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 7354.1 - Policy

State Regulations
(a) Environmental
conditions significantly influence the overall effectiveness of facility
operations. Standards for lighting, air quality, temperature and noise levels
are designed to preserve the health and well-being of youth and staff members
and to promote the operational stability and security of each
facility. (b) Consistent with the
requirements of this Part, the director shall develop written policies and
procedures that govern environmental health and safety. These policies and
procedures shall be reviewed annually and updated as needed. Notes
